p: In designing the application for COVID-19 patients, the first step was to extensively review the related literature on the pre-existing applications in terms of effectiveness, appropriateness to the target group, specific features, and probable discussions in design. Then, in several meetings with internal specialists, psychologists, sports consultants, and medical informaticians (no. of experts = 5), the scientific aspects of the topic, patients' needs during hospitalization and after discharge and the necessity of offering complementary solutions were analyzed. Consequently, according to the present findings, experts' comments and patients' cultural and local tendencies, the main features of the application were specified for the design.
